QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Epley maneuver
QAPair.Answer: The Epley maneuver is a series of head movements to relieve symptoms of benign positional vertigo . Benign positional vertigo is also called benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV). BPPV is caused by a problem in the inner ear. Vertigo is the feeling that you are spinning or that everything is spinning around you.
